data.eml:eml: The genus Hyboella Hancock (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae: Metrodorinae) in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deng, Wei-An, Zheng, Zhe-Min, Wei, Shi-Zhen (2009): The genus Hyboella Hancock (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae: Metrodorinae) in China. Zootaxa 2064: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186902
